--- title: "Multiway and multivariate factorial designs" --- ## Content - ANOVA with two or more factors - ANOVA with both within-subject and between-subject factors - Multivariate analysis of variance ## Learning objectives At the end of the session, students should be capable of - analyzing models with both within-subject and between-subject factors - specifying and calculating custom contrasts in multiway factorial designs - correctly interpreting an analysis of variance table - testing model assumptions in multivariate model ## Readings - {{< fa book >}} [Chapter 7](https://lbelzile.github.io/math80667a/multiway.html) of the course notes - {{< fa book >}} [Chapter 8](https://lbelzile.github.io/math80667a/manova.html) of the course notes - {{< fa book-open-reader >}} [Three-way ANOVA example](/example/threewayanova.html) - {{< fa book-open-reader >}} [MANOVA example](/example/manova.html) ## Complementary readings - {{< fa book >}} Chapters 8 and 14 of @Maxwell.Delaney.Kelley:2017. - {{< fa book >}} Chapters 20--23 of @Maxwell.Delaney.Kelley:2017. ## Slides

View all slides in new window Download PDF of all slides
